Package msnotepad.init

Class InitialValues

java.lang.Object
msnotepad.init.InitialValues
public class InitialValues
extends java.lang.Object
InitialValues class help to get the initial values of the MSNotepad, and, also save these parameters in the "Settings.txt" file at the window close and load these parameters again in the variables at the start.
